name: Fallout New Age! (Todd)
description:
You start your new Journey to save the Wasteland of Mutated Brahmin!
A Vault Dweller of Vault 21 as your passage leads you through ruins
and deserted Wastelands. Gathering whatever supplies you can carry.
Priests are in short supply of Holy Water! Mutated Brahmin attack
on sight. Swamp creatures appear almost out of nowhere! Blacksmiths
are in need of metal to be able to upgrade weapons they sell. Many
other Dwellers of these Vaults can help guide you, with the help
of other Vault Tech's and Computer terminals that keep track of
your status, and transitions from plane to plane. This is no ordinary
mission! Your goal here is to rid the Brahmin of all muations and
make them normal animals again so the people don't starve! Save the
land, save the people! easy? not at all, there are Deathclaws, Brahmin
and Raiders. Giant mutant BoatFlies, Swamp creatures, Rad roaches...
and so much more than just a story! It's a new life, a new journey! 

( Many minor bugs fixed in this version! Smoother frame rates! More tips! )

If you enjoyed this game and would like to see more, please DONATE to help in future game production development incentives! Please leave your comments and concerns.
